#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;

const int MAXN = 30;

int limit[MAXN];
int weight[MAXN];

int main() {
	int testCases;
	cin>>testCases;
	while (testCases--) {
		int n;
		cin>>n;
		for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) 
			cin>>weight[i];
		for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
			cin>>limit[i];
		sort(weight, weight + n);
		sort(limit, limit + n);
		int res = 0;
		for (int i = 0, j = 0; i < n && j < n; i++) {
			while (j < n && weight[i] > limit[j])
				j++;
			if (j < n) {
				res++;
				j++;
			}
		}
		cout<<res<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
